full_text: The UN’s genocide convention counts “measures intended to prevent births”, if their aim is “to destroy, in whole or in part, a national, ethnical, racial or religious group”  https://t.co/QMm8iqbB7k

localize.full_text: 联合国《灭绝种族罪公约》将 "旨在防止生育的措施 "算作 "旨在全部或部分消灭一个民族、族裔、种族或宗教群体 "https://t.co/QMm8iqbB7k。
聯合國《滅絕種族罪公約》將 "旨在防止生育的措施 "算作 "旨在全部或部分消滅一個民族、族裔、種族或宗教羣體 "https://t.co/QMm8iqbB7k。
